name: Cowboy Bandit The Game- Cowboy Jump Game
name_original: Cowboy Bandit The Game- Cowboy Jump Game
description:
Cowboy Bandit - Cowboy Jump Game

Help Nick the cowboy bandit get enough loot to escape to the Bahamas!!! Run through levels avoiding obstacles, jumping across cliffs avoid camp fires left behind by other bandits and all while you try to collect all the loot you can get your hands on!!

Compete against your friends in Game Center to achieve the highest score.
